description: Triangle of Eulerian numbers with rows multiplied by 1+x.
references: L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 243.
R. L. Graham, D. E. Knuth and O. Patashnik, Concrete Mathematics. Addison-Wesley, Reading, MA, 1990, p. 254.
J. Riordan, An Introduction to Combinatorial Analysis, Wiley, 1958, p. 215.
crossrefs: Columns include A000325. Row sums are in A098558.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: G.f. and more terms from _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 06 2001
